==Windows To Go==
  +
Windows To Go is an upcoming Windows 8 feature that will allow used to create bootable USB Flash drive with Windows 8 in it, including the users programs, settings and files, efectivly making it a [[Live USB]].<ref>http://www.computerworld.com/s/article/9220004/Windows_8_will_run_from_USB_thumb_drive?taxonomyId=125</ref><ref>http://www.gmanews.tv/story/232480/technology/windows-8-fits-on-a-thumb-drive</ref>
